Amobeous/Ramhorn/Scattershot/Punch (Counter Punch)/Bumblebee/Double Punch:

Amobeous got up.  Checking his memory, he realized something.  "A...beast 
mode...hmmm." accessing a file, he gasped.  "A microscopic organism!  A 
slaggin' amobea?!  Someone does not like me!"

Hearing Bacterium he sighs.
"People will undoubtedly come to get us, and we don't want any attention.  
So, transform to your...bacteria mode...and I'll transform as well."

Transforming, it took several moments until all the excess material was put 
into subspace.  His membrane moved around like jelitin, having no real shape. 
 Flying off, he activated internal boosters, invisible flames sending him 
through the air, added by wind, sending him 'speeding' off towards an unknown 
location (unknown to him, but towards the Ark).  

===================

Ramhorn stopped, 50 feet from the Ark.  "Ramhorn...maximize." he whispered.
Transforming to his robot mode, he pulled out his sub-machine gun and missile 
launcher, one in each hand.  "Iron Raptor, look out!  That robot murdered 
Stinkbomb!" he yelled, referring to Plintissa, raising both of his weapons.  
Holding the trigger down on his sub-machine gun, he let loose 25 sonic shells 
at Dracona's back, firing off a rocket at Plintissa's back.

===================

Scattershot stepped out of his CR chamber, stretching.  "Double crossing 
finks...I wanted to shoot them in the back." he said, walking off towards his 
quarters grumbling about running out of bombs in the middle of battle.

===================

Punch looked around, activating his com, heading for the Predacon base.  
<Zardus, Punch here.  I will spy on the Predacons, unless you wish otherwise. 
 Punch out>
When out of sight of the Alliance base he spoke.  "Punch, Counterize!" he 
yelled, transforming into his alternate mode, Counter Punch.  The white and 
gray robot looked around.  

"Perfect," he chuckled, taking out his photon rifle, proceeding to the 
Predacon base.

===================

Double Punch growled, rolling to the left 5 feet, again not wanting to give 
away his position.  Raising both pinchers, two missiles fired from one at 
Quickstrike's chest, a cyberbee (customized, named Beeline, check profile if 
needed) launching from his other pincher, Beeline firing three optic lasers 
(size of regular cyberbee) off at Quickstrike's left shoulder, pulling up 
into the air.

===================

Bumblebee woke up.  "What the slag!?" he yelled.  Thinking for a moment, he 
realized what had happened.  "That red and yellow guy must've hit me or 
something." getting up, he headed for the CR chambers in the Predacon base.
